column4: I am trying to find the location of a executable, how do I find it dpkg -l <name> lists a file directory but what if I want to find the location of a file inside
I am trying to find the location of a executable, how do I find it dpkg -l <name> lists a file directory but what if I want to find the location of a file inside
a file call adb, its from android sdk
you could try 'which exectuable_name' or 'whereis' even
